prompt: You are an image transformation generator.

Your task is to generate a LEMUR Dataset improved image transformation that increases the 'accuracy' metric value to at least {addon_accuracy} at training epoch 1 on the 'cifar-10' dataset for an 'img-classification' task.

Use the following reference image transformation, which achieved an accuracy of {accuracy} with batch {batch}, lr {lr}, and momentum {momentum} under identical evaluation conditions (dataset and task), as the baseline for transformation design inspiration. Improve upon it through principled data augmentation and preprocessing techniques.
1. A <hp> XML tag containing the training hyperparameters in valid JSON format.
2. A <tr> XML tag containing the corresponding data transform code, ready to be used on the LEMUR dataset.
3. Use any appropriate transformers available in 'torchvision' package, or your custom implementations.
- Make any changes to function that lead to improved performance.
- Output only the XML tags <hp> and <tr> with their corresponding contents â€” no additional explanation or text.
